phrases: I'm having this left shoulder pain lately, and it's paining a lot.
I was in gymnastics class... Maybe I must have toppled over into some weird position, it started to pain since, because of a certain move.
Any movement on my left shoulder hurts.
I did take a Tylenol for two or three days, but that didn't help at all.
Pain with any movement of the left shoulder.
From the x-ray, it doesn't look there is any broken bone or fracture.
Continue using the pain reliever, maybe just 600 milligram of ibuprofen three times a day and use it for a week.
If it's still painful, you can use ice or heat pad... might help relieve your pain.
Definitely not [carrying heavy weights]. Use hand instead... rest your left arm while it's healing.
Come back to see me if the pain still there after maybe three weeks... may repeat the left shoulder x-ray at that time.
I did have past surgery on my left arm... that doesn't seem related to your pain.
You can also try Advil... Aleve.
